titleStmt.title: SII 4.372: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri

No. 372. (A.R. No. 49 of 1890). ON THE EAST WALL OF THE ROCK-CUT CAVE CALLED UMAIYANDAN-KOYIL ON THE SOUTH SIDE OF THE ROCK OF TIRUPPARANKUNRAM NEAR MADURA, MADURA TALUK AND DISTRICT. This inscription with text, transliteration and translation has been printed in Burgess and Natesa Sastri's Archaeological Survey of Southern India, Vol. IV, pp. 43 to 55. It is, however, published here again with the correct reading of the text.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
First section
svasti śrī . pūmaruviya tirumaṭantaiyum puvimaṭan
taiyum puyattiruppa nāmaruviya kalaimaṭantaiyum jayamaṭa
ntaiyum nalañciṟappak koḷārnta ciṉappuliyuṅ koṭuñ
cilaiyuṅ kulaintoḷippa vāḷārnta poṟkirimel varikka
yalkaḷ viḷaiyāṭa Iruṅkaṭalvalaiyat tiṉitaṟamperukak karuṅka
li kaṭintu ceṅkolnaṭappa Orukuṭai niḻali lirunilaṅ kuḷira muva
kait tamiḻu muṟaimaiyil viḷaṅka nālvakai vetamu navinṟuṭan
vaḷara Aiyvakai veḻviyuñ ceyviṉai yiyaṟṟa Aṟuvakaic camai
yamum Aḻakuṭan tikaḻa Eḻuvakaippāṭalu miyaluṭaṉ parava Eṇṭicai
yaḷavuñ cakkarañ cellak koṅkaṇar kaliṅkar kocalar māḷuvar ciṅka
ḷar teliṅkar cinar kuccarar villavar makatar vikkalar cempiyar pallava
r mutaliyar pāttiparellā muṟaiviṭa maruḷeṉa Oruvarmunoruvar mu
ṟaimuṟai kaṭava tantiṟai kuṇan tiṟaiñc Ilaṅkoḷi maṇimuṭi Intiran pū
ṭ ṭi]ya puraikatirāra mārpiṉil poliyap paṉimalart tāmarait ticai
mukaṉ paṭaitta maṉuṉeri taḻaippa maṇimuṭi cūṭip ponnicūḻ
nāṭṭiṟ puliyāṇai poyakalak kaṉṉicūḻnāṭṭiṟ kayalāṇai kai
kayvaḷara veñciṉa vivuḷiyum veḻamum parappit tañcaiyum Uṟantai
yum centaḻal koḷuttik kāviyum nilamum ninṟu kaviniḻappa vāviyu mā
ṟumaṇinir nalanaḻittuk kūṭamu māmatinnuṅ kopuramu māṭaraṅku māṭamuma
āḷikaiyu maṇṭapamum pala viṭittut toḻutu vantaṭaiyār niru
patan tokaiyar Aḻuta kaṇṇīrāṟu parappik kaḻutaikoṇ ṭuḻutu ka
vaṭivittic cempiyaṉaic ciṉamiriyap porutu curampukavoṭṭippai
pampoṉmuṭi paṟittup pāṇaṉukkuk kuṭuttaruḷip pāṭaruñ ciṟap
piṟ parutivāṉṟo yāṭakappuricai yāyirattaḷiyil coḻavaḷavaṉabhi
ṣekamaṇṭapattu virābhi[ṣe]kañceytu pukaḻ virittu nāḷum para
rācar nāmattalai piṭuṅki miḷun taṟukaṇ matayāṉaimel koṇ
ṭu nirāḻivaiyyamuḻutum potuvoḻittuk kūrāḻiyuñ ceyya
toḷume koṇṭupoy Aiyyappaṭāta Arumaṟaite rantaṇar
vāḻ teyvappuliyū(r)rt tiruvellaiyil pukkup poṉṉampalam
poliya vāṭuvār pūvaiyuṭan maṉṉun tirumeṉi kaṇṭu manaṅkaḷi
ttuk kolamalarmelayaṉuṅ kuḷirtuḻāymālu maṟiyā malaṟcevaṭi
vaṇaṅki vāṅkuciṟaiyaṉṉan tuyiloḻiya vaṇṭeḻuppum pūṅkama
lavāvicūḻ poṉṉamarāpatiyil Ottulakan tāṅku muyarmeruvai
k kuṇarntu vaittaṉaiya cotimaṇimaṇṭapat tiruntu colaima
lip paḻanaṟcoṇāṭu tāṉiḻanta mālaimuṭiyun taravaruka venṟaḻaippa
vāṉanilaikulaiya vāṇakarik kappuṟattup poṉa vaḷavaṉ Urimaiyo
ṭum pukuntu peṟṟaputalvaṉai niṉperenṟu muṉ kāṭṭi veṟṟi yariya
ṇaikkiḻ viḻuntu toḻutiprappat tāṉoṭi muṉṉikaḻnta vemmaiye
lāṅ kaiyyakalat tāṉotakampaṇṇit taṇṭār muṭiyuṭaṉe vi
ṭṭa pukaliṭantan māraṉaikkuttiriya viṭṭapaṭikkeṉṟumitu piṭipā
ṭākaveṉap poṅkutiraiñālattu pūpālar toḷviḷaṅkuñ ce
ṅkayal koṇṭuṉaṟuntirumukamum paṇṭiḻanta coḷapatiyeṉṉu
nāmamu n=toṉṉakarum miḷa vaḻaṅki viṭaikuṭuttu viṭṭaruḷi vākaik
katirvel vaṭaventartam pātam mekat taḷai paṇiya virakkaḻa laṇin
tu viḷaṅkiya maṇiyaṇivirasiṁhāsanattu vaḷaṅkeḻu kavari Irumaru
ṅkacaippak kaṭaleṉa muḻaṅkuṅ kaḷiṉalliyāṉai vaṭapulaventar ma
ṇippuyam piriyā Ilakukuḻai yarivaiyir toḻutu niṟentum Ulakamu
ḻutuṭaiyāroṭum viṟṟiruntaruḷiya [śrī]komāṟapaṉmarāṉatribhuvaṉac
cakravattikaḷ coṇāṭu vaḻaṅkiyaruḷiya śrī[su]ndarapāṇṭiyatevaṟku yā
ṇṭu Eḻāvatu ṉāḷ muṉṉūṟṟirupattañciṉāl maturotaiyavaḷaṉāṭ
ṭu māṭakkuḷakkiḻ maturaikkoyil paḷḷiyaṟaikkūṭattup paḷḷi
ppiṭa maḻavarāyanil Eḻuntaruḷi Iruntu Irāvaḷar prasannadevar
Second section
tirupparaṅkuṉṟattut teṉpākattuk kuṭpakkattil Eḻuntaruḷivitta cuntarapāṇṭiyaīśvaramuṭai
yār koyil civabrāhmaṇarum sthānapatikaḷum ceyyat tiruvāymoḻintaruḷiṉapaṭi Ittevaṟkut tiruppa
ṭimāṟṟuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭum nivuntaṅkaḷukkum tiruppaṇikkum viranārāyaṇakkuḷakkiḻ puḷiṅkuṉṟūrāṉa cu
ntarapāṇṭiyapurattu kaṇṭuḻavāṉa nilattile Orupakkamaṭaiya malaikkuṭikkolāl perumpūvum kuṟuvaiyum
viḷaiyum nilattile nilam Āṟumāvum Orupūviḷaiyum nilattu nilam Āṟumāvum Āka nilam Araiye Iraṇṭumāvum
kāraāṇmai miyāṭciyum Antarāyamum mākkalamum veṭṭipāṭṭamum pañcupili cantuvikkirakappeṟum pāṭikā
valum maṟṟum Epperppaṭṭiṉavum Eṭṭāvatu mutal telatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāka Iṭappeṟaveṇumenṟu
maḻavarāyaṉ ṉamakkuc coṉṉamaiyil Ittevaṟkut tiruppaṭimāṟṟuḷḷiṭṭu ve ṇṭun nivantaṅkaḷukkum tiruppa
ṇikkum viranārāyaṇakkuḷakkiḻ puḷiṅkunṟūrāṉa cuntarapāṇṭiyapurattuk kaṇṭuḻavāṉa nilattile Orupakka
maṭaiya malaikkuṭikkolāl perumpūvum kuṟuvaiyum viḷaiyum nilattu nilam Āṟu māvum Orupūviḷaiyum nilattu ni
lam Āṟumāvum Āka nilam Araiye Iraṇṭumāvum kārāṇmai miyāṭciyum Antarāyamu mākkalamum veṭṭi
pāṭṭamum pañcupili cantuvikkirakappeṟum pāṭikāvalum maṟṟum Epperpaṭaṭiṉavum Uṭpaṭa Ivvāṇṭumutal
tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāka Iṭṭu variyilār Eḻuttiṭṭa Uḷvariyum nam Ōlaiyum taraccoṉṉom kaikkoṇṭu tiruppaṇiyu
m tiruppaṭimāṟṟuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭum nivantaṅkaḷ cellappaṇṇukavenṟum Ippaṭi cantirātittavaṟ celvatākak ka
lliluñ cempilum veṭṭivittukkoḷkaveṉṟu tiruvāymoḻintaruḷiṉār Ivai miḻalaikkūṟṟattuk kiḻkūṟ
ṟu veṭciyūrāṉa mummuṭicoḻanallūr veṭṭaṉūruṭaiyāṉ veṇkāṭutevaṉ tirukkāroṇamuṭaiyāṉāṉa kulaice
karamātavarāyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai miḻalaikkūṟṟattuk kiḻkūṟṟu viḷattū raāṉa jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻaṉallūr viḷattūr
uṭaiyān civallavaṉ cuntarattoḷuṭaiyāṉāṉa Atikaimāṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai miḻalaikkūṟṟattu naṭuviṟkūṟṟup pullu
kkuṭip poṉpaṟṟi Uṭaiyāṉ moṇṇaippirāṉ Aḻakapperumāḷāṉa nila kaṅkaraiyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai kiḻvem
paṉāṭṭut taccaṉūr maṇṭaiyāḻvāṉ katirāyiramuṭaiyāṉāṉa vicaiya rā[yaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai maturotayavaḷanāṭṭup
puṟappaṟaḷai nāṭṭup puttūruṭaiyāṉ poṉṉaṉ Upakāriyāṉa cetarappallavaraiyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai maturotayavaḷa
nāṭṭuk karañai Irukkai Uḻakkuṭi Araiyaṉ Uṭaiyāṉāṉa k(o)raḷarājaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai tirumallināṭṭut taṭaṅki
ṇṇicciṟṟūruṭaiyāṉ centaṉ Uyyaniṉṟāṭuvāṉāṉa kurukulattaraiyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai kiḻccempilnāṭṭu mālaṅ
kuṭikiḻavaṉ pullāṇi Irāmaṉāṉa Irājarājaviḻupparaiyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai Aṇṭanāṭṭup perumaṇalūr mantari Irāmaṉā
ṉa pallavarājaṉ Eḻuttu .u tribhuvaṉaccakravatti koneriṉmaikoṇṭāṉ Irāvaḷar prasaṉṉadevar tirupparaṅkunṟat
tut teṉ pākattukkup pakkattil Eḻuntaruḷuvitta cuntarapāṇṭiya Īśvaramuṭaiyār koyil śivabrāhmaṇarkkum sthāṉapati
kaḷukkum Ittevaṟkut tiruppaṭimāṟṟuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭun nivantaṅkaḷukkum tiruppaṇikkum viranārāyaṇakkuḷakkiḻ pu
ḷiṅkuṉṟūrāṉa cuntarapāṇṭiyapurattuk kaṇṭuḻavāṉa nilattile Oru pakkamaṭaiya malaikkuṭikkolāl perumpūvum
kuṟuvaiyum viḷaiyum nilattile nilam Āṟu māvum Orupū viḷaiyum nilattu nilam Āṟu māvum Āka nilam Araiye Ira
ṇṭu māvum kaārāṇmai miyāṭciyum Antarāyamu mākkalamum veṭṭipāṭṭamum pañcupili cantuvikkirakappeṟum pāṭikāva
lum maṟṟum Epperppaṭṭaṉavum Uṭpaṭa Eṭṭāvatu mutal tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāka Iṭappeṟaveṇumeṉṟu maḻava
rāyar namakkuc coṉṉamaiyil Ittevarkkut tiruppaṭimāṟṟuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭun nivantaṅkaḷukkum tiruppaṇikkum vi
ranārāyaṇakkuḷakkiḻ puḷiṅkunṟūrāṉa cuntarapāṇṭipurattu kaṇṭuḻavāṉa nilattile Oru pakkamaṭaiya malaikkuṭik
kolāl perumpūvum kuṟuvaiyum viḷaiyum nilattu nilam Āṟu māvum Oru pū viḷaiyum nilattu nilam Āṟu māvum Āka ni
lam Araiye Iraṇṭu māvum kaārāṇmai miyāṭciyu mantarāyamum mākkalamum veṭṭipāṭṭamum pañcupili cantuvikkira
kappeṟum pāṭikāvalu maṟṟu Epperppaṭṭaṉavum Uṭpaṭa Ivvāṇṭu mutal tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāka Iṭṭu variyilār
Eḻuttiṭṭa Uḷvariyum keḻviyum taraccoṉṉom kaikkoṇṭu tiruppaṭi māṟṟuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭun nivantaṅkaḷum tiru
ppaṇiyum cellappaṇṇi Ippaṭi candrādittavaṟ celvatākakkalliluñ cempilum veṭṭivittukkoḷka U
meturātayavaḷanāṭṭuk kāṉai Irukkai Uḻakkuṭic cuntarattoḷaṉ muttaṉāṉa teṉṉavataraiyaṉ Eḻuttu . yāṇṭu E
ṭṭu nāḷ Eḻupatu Ivai koṭumaḷūruṭaiyāṉ tirumuṭicūṭṭiṉāṉ Uttamapāṇṭiyaviḻupparaiyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai A
ṇṭanāṭṭup perumaṇalūr mantari Irāmaṉāṉa pallavarājaṉ Eḻuttu . yāṇṭu Eṭṭāvatu nāḷ kaārāṇmai
miyāṭciyum Antarāyamu mākkalamum veṭṭipāṭṭamum pañcupili cantuvikkirakappeṟum pāṭikāvalum maṟṟu Eppe
rppaṭṭaṉavum Uṭpaṭat tevatāṉaiṟaiyili Iṭṭapaṭikku Uḷvari Irāvaḷar prasannadevar māṭakkuḷakkiḻt tiru
pparaṅkunṟattut teṉpākattuk kuṭpakkattil Eḻuntaruḷuvitta cuntarapāṇṭiya Īśvaramuṭaiyāṟkut tiruppaṭi
māṟṟuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭun nivantaṅkaḷukkum tiruppaṇikkum Eṭṭā(ā)vatu nāḷ mutal kārāṇmai miyāṭciyum Anta
rāyamum mākkalamum veṭṭipāṭṭamum pañcupili cantuvikkirakappeṟum pāṭikāvalum maṟṟum Epperppaṭṭiṉavu
m Uṭpaṭat tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāka viraṉārāyaṇakkuḷakkiḻ puḷiṅkuṉṟūrāṉa cuntarapāṇṭiyapurattuk kaṇṭuḻa
vāṉa nilattil Orupakkamaṭaiya malaikkuṭikolāl perumpūvum kuṟuvaiyum viḷaiyum nilattil nilam Āṟu māvu
m Oru pū viḷaiyum nilattil nilam Āṟu māvum Āka nilam Araiye Iraṇṭu māvum kārāṇmai miyāṭciyum Antarāyamu
m mākkalamum veṭṭipāṭṭamum pañcupili cantuvikkirakappeṟum pāṭikāvalum maṟṟum Epperppaṭṭaṉavum Uṭpaṭa
t tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāka Iṭṭamaikku Ivai puravuvaritiṇaikkaḷaṉāyakam miḻalaikkūṟṟattuk kiḻkūṟṟup poṉpaṟ
ṟi Uṭaiyāṉ tiruppūvaṇamuṭaiyāṉ tirukkāṭutevaṉāṉa vicaiyakāmaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai nuḷampātarāyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ippa
tuṭi Ivai miḻalaikkūṟṟattu pāmpāṟṟu mummorc ciṟuvampūruṭaiyān Aruḷāḷaṉ cīrāmaṉāṉa cuntarapāṇṭiyakkāṭu
veṭṭi Eḻuttu . Ippatuṭi Ivai toṇṭaimāṉ Eḻuttu . Ippatuṭi Ivai keraḷarāmaṉ Eḻuttu . Ippatuṭi kāliṅkarājaṉ E
ḻuttu . Ivai kāṅkeyarāyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai puravuvaritiṇaikkaḷanāyakam miḻalaikkūṟṟattu naṭuviṟkkūṟṟut taccane
ṉmaliuṭaiyāṉ Eṟutiruvuṭaiyāṉ nāraāyaṇaṉāṉa Īḻattaraiyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ipputupaṭi Ivai virāṭarājaṉ Eḻuttu . I
vai vattarājaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai cuntarapāṇṭiyanantipaṉmaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai muṉaiyataraiyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai puravuvari
tiṇaikkaḷanāyakam karuṅkuṭināṭṭuk kiḻṇeṭṭūrr kirttivicālaiyanallūr kariyamālaḻakaṉāṉa Uttamamaviḻupparaiyaṉ E
ḻuttu . Ivai puravuvaritiṉaikkaḷaṉāyakam coḻamaṇṭalattu rācentiracoḻavaḷaṉāṭṭu Īcaṉūruṭaiyāṉ Āticcatevan
Āḻiyaṅkayyaṉāṉa pāttiyataraiyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai puravuvaritiṇaikkaḷaṉāyakam vaṭatalaiccempilnāṭṭuṭṭu Āykkuṭiyāṉa Aḻakiyapā
ṇṭiyanallūr comatevaṉ Aḻakiyamaṇavāḷaṉāṉa villavarāyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai puravuvaritiṇaikkaḷaṉāyakam miḻalaikkūṟṟattu
kiḻkūṟṟut taccaṉūruṭaiyāṉ tevakkutevaṉ Aḻakaṉāṉa vāṉava ḻuttu . Ivai paracurāmaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai pura
vuvaritiṇaikkaḷaṉāyakam miḻalaikkūṟṟattu Eḻuttu .
